module.name: CID Superfecta
module.description: Provides simultaneous use of, and complete control over multiple caller id data sources.
module.changelog: *14.0.16* Bugfix/FREEPBX-17727 *14.0.15* FREEPBX-17387 store pre and post cnam in channel vars *14.0.14* FREEPBX-15699 add DID send to sources *14.0.13* FREEPBX-17332 fix send-to order bug *14.0.12* FREEPBX-14139 fix issues with cache and trunk provided *14.0.11* FREEPBX-15891 fix for connectwise bug *14.0.10* FREEPBX-17220 trivial fix *14.0.9* Bugfix/FREEPBX-13273 *14.0.8* FREEPBX-17279 Add IFTT support *14.0.7* FREEPBX-17421 Set default values *14.0.6* FREEPBX-10782 validate configuration parameters. *14.0.5* fix pushbullet API for non-active devices *14.0.4* DasTelefonBuch fixes *14.0.3* source-TelefonABC_Austria.module online editiert mit Bitbucket *14.0.2* If the Caller ID is 'unknown', 'anonymous' or empty then skip the check *14.0.1* Forked from 13.0.4
